arts.ttl: Burnley player ratings vs Swansea City as four 8/10s handed out after comfortable win - gallery
arts.sum: Burnley were barely forced to get out of first gear as they cruised to a comfortable victory against Swansea City.

arts.ttl: Scott Parker's immediate reaction to Burnley's 'professional' win at Swansea City as Clarets move into second
arts.sum: Scott Parker was pleased with how his Burnley side managed a potentially tricky tie against Swansea City following a hectic recent schedule.

arts.ttl: Burnley beat Swansea to climb above Sheff Utd into second
arts.sum: Burnley moved into the top two in the Sky Bet Championship with a comfortable 2-0 victory over Swansea at the Swansea.com Stadium.

arts.ttl: Swansea City 0-2 Burnley: Visitors breeze past sluggish Swans to dent Sheehan job hopes
arts.sum: The Swans went down 2-0 at home to Burnley on Saturday afternoon

arts.ttl: Burnley climb into Championship automatic promotion places with win at Swansea
arts.sum: Goals from Josh Brownhill and Jaidon Anthony put the Clarets in control, with victory seeing them go above Sheffield United who play on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Swansea City 0-2 Burnley: Clarets climb into top two to pile pressure on Sheffield United
arts.sum: Burnley were barely made to get out of first gear as they cruised to a comfortable win against Swansea City to move into the Championship’s top two.

arts.ttl: 25 photos of Burnley fans arriving at the Swansea.com Stadium
arts.sum: Burnley fans have made the long trip down to South Wales as the Clarets face Swansea City hoping to extend their unbeaten to 25 games and continue their push for automatic promotion back to the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Swansea City v Burnley confirmed XIs and team news as Josh Laurent gets the nod in midfield
arts.sum: Josh Laurent has been preferred to Hannibal for Burnley’s trip to Swansea City today.

arts.ttl: Swansea City v Burnley Live: Kick-off time, team news and score updates
arts.sum: Follow live updates from the Swansea.com as Swansea take on Burnley

arts.ttl: Scott Parker issues Burnley promotion warning ahead of Swansea City challenge as Sheffield United forced to watch on
arts.sum: Burnley have the chance to pile on the pressure in the fight for automatic promotion when they take on Swansea City this afternoon.
